blogArray.title: SvelteKit Remake
blogArray.subtitle: Its here better aligned than ever
blogArray.blog: The new SvelteKit remake of the site is here, finally working and running well. I have put in some serious effort in it, so I hope it looks nice. The mobile alignment update is also done.

blogArray.title: Aseprite gif
blogArray.blog: I plan on making my own aseprite gif, just like emma has on the "friends"-tab and on her own website. I do not know when it will be ready tho
